description: Navigate to OK便利店 Circle K. The route proceeds northwest along the main road, passing a bus stop and a ParknShop on the right. The path continues straight past construction barriers, ignoring the text's instructions to turn right and left, which likely refer to an indoor or off-street path not taken in the images. The view ends on the street without entering a building.
